title: Can anyone help me with these fps drops
body: I play league and when i get into fights or just running down a lane i drop to about 144 fps to 44 fps idk why this is happening but i think i have some sort of idea. My graphics card Nvidia 1050 ti doesnt spin the blades on the fan when i play league because its not sucha  high end graphics game so i dont think my graphics card is being used and my cpu is thats why im getting fps drops any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: Riot is not addressing the FPS Issue posts because they will blame it on our end. The fact that my laptop can go from 300+ fps to 1 fps ( I am not joking I have pictures ) is bullshit. This only happened **in this patch** and they are just saying to update drivers and such. I wish they had the decency to actually put some effort from their part individually and address this issue.
Same boat except I only start at 120's or so. I've tried updating everything on my end. Ifâ€‹ you figure anything out please share. I'll do the same.

If your graphics cards' fan isn't running at all, it could be that it's starting to overheat and causing your FPS to drop. I'd like to see if fixing that first will bring that FPS back up. We can try using something like [**MSI Afterburner**](https://www.msi.com/page/afterburner) to manually turn that fan on.

Let me know how that works for you.

Its been something with the patch. There's lots of people (check Reddit) complaining. Riot will say use hextech repair tool and good luck. I've tried it a few times to no avail. Try the tool if not hope it's fixed soon
